entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 30 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Fog patches developing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
